Help Screen: G0013

Each and every field in the source table need to be configured in this Rule table

• Source Field Name: Field name in Source table

• Target Field Name: Field name in Target table (corresponding to the respective Source field)

• Default Field Name: Default value, if any, for the target field (e-g) For company ID, default value 1 could be specified

• Mandatory Indicator: This field indicates if it is a mandatory field in the target table. If yes, this field should not be blank.

This parameter is configured using item(s) YESNO in param P0050.

• Mapping Function: Name of the mapping / transformation function

• Validation Programs: Validation programs to be called for the field - More than one Function could be selected from the drop-down list

This parameter is configured using item(s) VALPROGS in param P0050.
